statements: UPDATE demographic_data SET awareness_level = 1 WHERE id = 2;

UPDATE public_health_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'Flu Vaccination', target_population = ARRAY['children', 'elderly'] WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE demographic_data SET income = 50000.00, age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE location = 'New York';

UPDATE demographic_data SET income = 50000, location = 'Urban' WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 40;
UPDATE public_health_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'Summer Health Campaign' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_impact SET impact_score = 8.5 WHERE impact_id = 3;
UPDATE public_health_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_impact SET impact_score = 8.5 WHERE campaign_id = 2 AND data_id = 3;
UPDATE demographic_data SET city='New York', age=30 WHERE id=1;
